    func _ready():
        var dialog = ScriptCreateDialog.new();
        dialog.config("Node", "res://new_node.gd") # å¯¹äºå¼•æ“å†…ç½®ç±»å‹ã€‚
        dialog.config("\"res://base_node.gd\"", "res://derived_node.gd") # å¯¹äºè„šæœ¬ç±»å‹ã€‚

 .. code-tab:: csharp

    public override void _Ready()
    {
        var dialog = new ScriptCreateDialog();
        dialog.Config("Node", "res://NewNode.cs"); // å¯¹äºå¼•æ“å†…ç½®ç±»å‹ã€‚
        dialog.Config("\"res://BaseNode.cs\"", "res://DerivedNode.cs"); // å¯¹äºè„šæœ¬ç±»å‹ã€‚
        dialog.PopupCentered();
    }
